sentences.sContent: Insect populations fluctuate wildly from year to year.
sentences.sCn: 昆虫的数量每年变化很大。

sentences.sContent: Prices were volatile, fluctuating between 20 and 40.
sentences.sCn: 价格不稳定，在20至40美元之间波动。

exam.question: With prices ______ so much, it is difficult for the school to plan a budget.

answer.explain: 句意： 物价起伏这么大， 学校很难制订预算。vibrate： (使)振动； flutter： 拍翅； 飘动； swing： 摇摆。

remMethod.val: flu(流动) ＋ ctu ＋ ate → 流动 → 波动， 涨落

trans.tranOther: to change frequently in size, amount, quality, etc., especially from one extreme to another
